subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A leadoff bunt single in the first inning by José Reyes seemed to discombobulate Chuck James, Atlanta’s starting pitcher, in what became a 7-2 Mets victory.
snippet: A leadoff bunt single in the first inning by José Reyes seemed to discombobulate Chuck James, Atlanta’s starting pitcher, in what became a 7-2 Mets victory.
